article_title: Oregon Passes a Smoke-Free Car Law, and Now I Want to Move There Even More

og.description: Since we made a visit to Seattle and British Columbia back in 2010, we have been building a dream of living in the Pacific Northwest. And after we had our daughter the next year, we began outlining a plan to move our jobs out that way. So we narrowed the search down to a few major cities in the Northwest, most of them being in Oregon. We were drawn to the state's culture and climate, and we have been trying our luck in their job market.
og.title: Oregon Passes a Smoke-Free Car Law, and Now I Want to Move There Even More

article_metadata.dc.title: Oregon Passes a Smoke-Free Car Law, and Now I Want to Move There Even More
